entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix all cases where platform values are propagating to xplat code to use SetValueFromRenderer #16654
  • After upgrading to Visual Studio 2022 Preview to 17.8.0 Empty MAUI App does not compile #16652
  • Publish replaces "net6.0" tag in Class library with "net6.0-windows10.0.19041" #16649
  • Can't use WebView with local files stored as MauiAssets on Windows #16646
    Backlog
  • Bug: Multiple platforms Editor & Entry Two Way binding to text (Net 8 Preview 7) #16636
    Backlog
  • Add Checkbox/Radio MenuFlyoutitem (similar to WinUI's ToggleMenuFlyoutItem and RadioMenuFlyoutItem) #16635
    Backlog
  • https://github.com/gorkhadk/maui_crash_reproduction #16630
  • LoadFromXaml is not working with ShellContent #16628
    Backlog
  • Net 7 and net 8 preview 1 side by side I get Platform version is not present for one or more target frameworks, #16626
  • Font auto scaling doesn’t work on iOS. #16625
    Backlog
  • SwipeGesture is not working on a listview #16624
    Backlog
  • TapGesture on Listview does not fire #16622
  • Shell page transition animation causes color blinking #16621
    Backlog
  • App is crashing on using "Share" word in MenuFlyoutSubItem #16618
    Backlog

Closed

  • maui has an dependecy to SponsorLink #16647
  • [Bug] StyleClass Setter does not set #11204
    Backlog
  • Blazor button events not firing on MAUI Hybrid project after .NET 8 Preview 7 package update #16616
  • Add `ToPlatform` extension methods for `PointerEventArgs` to retrieve platform events #16216
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.100-preview.7.23376.3] .NET Maui Blazor App throws "No interop methods are registered for renderer" javascript exception #16609
  • Support for ARKit and ARCore on .Net MAUI #16623
  • Bug report yaml is broken #16645
  • Web Inspector cannot use app #16611
  • [iOS] Write device test to validate CharacterSpacing changes #13361
    Backlog
  • ImageSource.FromStream Leads to Crash #15397
    .NET 8
  • GitInfo -> Devlooped.SponsorLink dependency violates privacy and collects developer PII without consent #16638
  • Prompts are missing when creating a new page #16325
    .NET 8 GA
  • Google maps not displaying anything after clearing data #16585
  • DynamicResource doesn't work when combined with AppThemeBinding #13619
    Backlog
  • Building with 'dotnet publish' in ADO Pipeline #16620
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] MAUI ios and maccatalyst don't build #16612
  • XamlC should optimize OnPlatform #5583
    Under Consideration
  • Extra space below status bar on iPhone 14 Pro Max #16617

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixed the tab bar not hiding/showing if property changed #16653
  • [net7.0] Resize internal content container when ScrollView content is resized #16651
  • [Housekeeping] Remove checkboxes from bug template #16650
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, Task
  • [android] update AOT profile for .NET 8.0.100-rc.1.23404.2 #16644
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 GA
  • [net7.0] Allow * rows/columns treated as Auto to expand during 2nd measure pass #16641
    area/layout 🔲, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [net7.0] Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #16640
    area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [net7.0] Use same type converter for Brush as for Color to enable XAML completion #16639
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Re-land "[Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing" #16637
    .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the aspnetcore group with 7 updates #16634
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Make ImageSourcePartExtensions public #16633
    area/image :framed_picture:, t/housekeeping ♻︎, i/regression
  • [Windows] Correctly propagate the BindingContext to SwipeView Content #16632
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix the OnNavigatedTo event and the OnAppearing event to return the ScrollToAsync method call #16619
    community ✨, layout-scrollview

Merged

  • [C] fix Specificity for VSM #16404
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 GA
  • Implement Additional PointerGestureRecognizer Platform Arguments #16426
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [Housekeeping] Fix broken bug template #16643
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, Task
  • Use runtime check for setting WKWebView inspectable flag #16631
    area/blazor 🕸️, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [iOS] Added DeviceTest to validate CharacterSpacing on Button #16603
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Setting binding on Label doesn't set text to incoming binding #16410
    area/controls 🎮, area/testing, .NET 8 GA
  • Adds prompts when creating a new page. #16331
    community ✨, backport/suggested, .NET 8 GA
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16592
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ios] fix memory leak in GraphicsView #16605
    area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦
  • [X] Support DynResources as AppThemeBinding values #16597
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Housekeeping] Add 8.0 preview 7 to bug report template #16613
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, Task
  • [X] Optimize OnPlatform element syntax #5611
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, Under Consideration

Updated

  • Fix issues with ScrollView on ios that does not correctly resize when… #15460
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨, .NET 8 GA
  • Add property for tapping on page to close soft input keyboard #16530
    area/keyboard, .NET 8 GA
  • Locate MAUI View for PlatformView #16463
    area/architecture, .NET 8 GA
  • Update Windows App SDK #16610
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak in DatePicker #16589
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Notify Shell tab title changes #16593
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, .NET 8 GA
  • Import Keyboard Extension APIs #16572
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • Allow "duplicate" files to be processed #16534
    area/single project ☝️, .NET 8 GA
  • [ios] fix memory leak in SwipeItem #16614
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • [ios] test MemoryAnalyzers package #16346
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview, Under Consideration
  • Add doc comments for common types used in templates, maps, webview #16552
    area/docs 📓, t/docs 📝, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, .NET 8 GA
  • Process the hardware enter key as "Done" #16386
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix single taps #16561
    platform/android 🤖, area/gestures
  • Add Position property to DragStartingEventArgs and DragEventArgs #16335
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • [build] Bump XCode to 14.3.1 #16374
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Display alerts on top of popups #16581
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, .NET 8 GA
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
